stories.text: Mental evening, got fu**ed in Boomtown, awesome! Pumping beats, snorted some ket. Entered K-hole which is dark in Boomtown. Great night though. Loved the second floor, downstairs was a bit much for me, but the large space and awesome building made my night.
I liked downstairs personally, there were some pretty dodgy guys down there, but the music was amazing. I didnâ€™t see anyone selling anything.
